text: Edwardsville, home to Southern Illinois University Edwardsville (SIUE) is a city in Madison County, Illinois, United States. As of 2020, the population was 26,808. It is the county seat of Madison County. The city was named in honor of Ninian Edwards, then Governor of the Illinois Territory. ==References== Category:Cities in Illinois Category:County seats in Illinois
title: Edwardsville, Illinois
